item.description:
Our own Max Jacobs will be giving his excellent talk and slide show about medicinal mushrooms. He may even give us some tips on where to find some currently available varieties! This is an excellent precursor to a mushroom foraging meetup that will be held later this year.

For more information: http://files.meetup.c...

Potluck to begin at 6:30
Talk to start around 7:15 or 7:30

Potluck breakdown:
Last name starting with A-G bring whatever you want
Last name starting with H-M bring bread or beverage
Last name starting with N-S main or side dish to share
Last name starting with T-Z bring salad or veg or dessert

Don't forget to bring your own potluck kit of plate/bowl/cup/utensils/cloth napkin - we're trying to move away from disposable or even compostable stuff!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: 2nd of 2 January Meetups: Medicinal Mushrooms w/Dr Max Jacobs
